Package org.jboss.elemento

Interface HTMLTextAreaElementMethods<E extends HTMLTextAreaElement,B extends TypedBuilder<E,B>>

All Superinterfaces:
IsElement<E>, TypedBuilder<E,B>
All Known Implementing Classes:
HTMLTextAreaElementBuilder
public interface HTMLTextAreaElementMethods<E extends HTMLTextAreaElement,B extends TypedBuilder<E,B>> extends TypedBuilder<E,B>, IsElement<E>
Provides methods and default implementations for modifying the attributes of an HTML text area element.
